analysis.description: ZcashClassic.isContract (/unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol:
	Contract ZcashClassic has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol#139-142)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ZcashClassic.claimToken (/unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol#216-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol#219-222)

ZcashClassic.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/43/0x97a5198b310ba58fe5d96b5f0421a9f1b4e772ca.sol)
